title: BRITAX B-SAFE: Adjusting the Recline Angle and Level of the Base
description: Instructions for adjusting the recline angle and level when installing the BRITAX B-SAFE Base.

asset.author: Britax Child Safety, Inc
asset.hookText: Instructions for adjusting the recline angle and level when installing the BRITAX B-SAFE Base. For more information about the B-SAFE, visit http://www.britaxusa.com/car-seats/b-safe.

transcripts: Installing the base, recline angle and leveling. To adjust the recline angle of the base hold in the button on the lever adjustment foot and move the foot up or down. The base is leveled when the green marker on each level indicator is visible between two white lines. If there is a problem achieving the proper recline angle after following the previous steps try another approve seating position in your vehicle or lower the adjustment foot to the lowest position and place a roll towel or pool noodle in the vehicle seat to level the base.
